title: 'Syrian' axeman attacks German train passengers, leaving four injured before he is overpowered
description: Several people were injured after a man wielding an axe attacked passengers on a busy train in Germany today.
content:
Several people were injured after a man wielding an axe attacked passengers on a busy train in Germany today.
The suspect, who has not been identified, was said to have lashed out at travellers on board the ICE 91 train to Vienna this afternoon at ar... [2555 chars]

title: Smaller firms to escape ‘burdensome’ Companies House filing rules
description: Exemption for businesses with turnover under £10.2m allowing simpler accounts to be submitted will be retained
content:
Changes to Companies House rules that would have axed an exemption allowing smaller businesses to file abbreviated accounts have been delayed amid concerns they could burden them with more red tape.
Legislation brought in by the previous Conservative... [1894 chars]

title: Pinwheel introduces a smartwatch for kids that includes an AI chatbot
description: The Pinwheel Watch is designed specifically for kids aged 7 to 14, offering parental management tools, GPS tracking, texting, and more.
content: As a parent, it can be daunting to hand over a smart device to their tween when a myriad of online dangers exist. Pinwheel, a kid-friendly tech company, is introducing a new solution for parents who want to stay connected with their children without ... [4832 chars]
